RACHEL REEVES - LATEST NEWS, VIEWS, ARTICLES AND COMMENT
How Labour's green energy splurge could cost taxpayers an extra £10 billion more than the party has admitted
10/07/23 00:33
Labour's massive green borrowing spree would cost taxpayers £10billion more than the party has admitted, it is claimed. Yesterday Shadow Chancellor Rachel Reeves confirmed that the party remains committed to eventually investing £28billion a year to help the environment if it wins power. She claimed the huge sum for jobs and technology would be paid for responsibly, having already pushed back its planned introduction in a U-turn last month. Ms Reeves told the BBC: 'I've always been clear that all our policies, including investing in the industries in the future and boosting our energy security, are subject to our fiscal rules.' She said this 'means paying for day-to-day spending through tax receipts and getting debt down'.
...read
